title: Why my club is gone, help
body: I am the owner of my club but one day my club is gone but my friend in the club confirmed that I am still the owner in the club

replies.body: What's the name of the club? I should be able to help out with that ^_^.

club name: AV directeurs
club tag: ProAV
thank you very much!!!!
Sorry for such a late reply, but check for that club now!

Hello,
I don't know if i should have start a new discussion or if i can write my problem here but it's also about my club.
I am the owner/leader of a club named "Chata√Ægne", tag "Lfray".
My problem is that on my profil not only I have not acces to the club, it looks like i am not part of it. But as i logged on one of my other account (which was also member in), i can still see that i am supposed to be the leader and the ownership didn't transfer.

I am Ydg, from the server EUW.
I hope you could maybe do something,

Thanks ~

Typically we prefer that you make your own post, which is mainly just to make sure that we see your message and don't miss it!

Since we're here already, I went ahead and fiddled around with that club a bit. You should be able to see it now! ^_^
Thanks a lot. I saw a lot of doublons so i wasn't sure since i am not using the forum/support.

Hello. I have the same problem.
Name: GoldenG8or
Tag: GG8
Thanks!
